thread.title: Borussia Dortmund 19-year-old Emre Mor scores superb goal for Turkey
thread.title_full: Borussia Dortmund 19-year-old Emre Mor scores superb goal for Turkey

author: Thomas Bristow
title: Borussia Dortmund 19-year-old Emre Mor scores superb goal for Turkey
text:
Get football   
Borussia Dortmund 19-year-old Emre Mor scored a superb goal on international duty for Turkey on Monday night. 
The Bundesliga side signed the incredibly talented teenager in the summer from FC Nordsjælland for just £5million. 
Despite only making 15 appearances in all competitions this season (10 of those from the bench), Mor has very much been earmarked as one for the future. 
The left-footed forward has electrifying pace and incredible control, and has earned comparisons with world's best player Lionel Messi. Mor proves he's got the pace (Photo: @VinesBVB / Twitter) 
And all these attributes were on show as he scored Turkey's first goal in their friendly against Moldova. Mor rounds the keeper to slot into an empty net (Photo: @VinesBVB / Twitter) 
Mor was played through by teammate Oguzhan Ozyakup before bursting away from four defenders. The forward competently took the ball round the keeper before slotting home. 
Expect much more from this lad in the coming years. poll loading Will Emre Mor be a hit at Dortmund? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
